title.narrative: PROSECUTING ENVIRONMENTAL CRIMES 18-22 NOV 2019. FY 2019 ILEA VAT OBLIGATION. Special Contracts for Research, Development and Others - Contractual Translation and Interpreting Services. ANTI-CORRUPTION AND PUBLIC CORRUPTION 23-27 SEP 19. FY 2018 ILEA VAT OBLIGATION. WILDLIFE TRAFFICKING INVESTIGATORS 13-24 AUG TRANS. FY 2020 ILEA-BOTSWANA GOVERNMENT CAPITAL CONTRIBUT. OVERSEAS PROTECTIVE OPERATIONS 9-13 JUL TRANSLATIO. FY 2019 ILEA STAFF FOB RSA TOKENS OBLIGATION. PR8272193: Transportation Surcharge. PUBLIC CORRUPTION: APR 16-20 2018 TRANSLATION. Value Added Taxes (VAT). FY 2018 SUPPLIES OBLIGATION. Telephone Communications Expenses - Telephone Tolls. WILDLIFE BORDER INSPECTION TRAINING 16-20 SEP 2019. PR8684055: ILEA:Stand up desk. CYBER INVESTIGATIONS 20-24 AUG 2018 TRANSLATION. FINANCIAL INVESTIGATIVE TECHNIQUES 5-9 NOV TRVL &. BASIC INVESTIGATION OF COMPUTER & ELECTR 6-10 AUG. FINANCIAL INVESTIGATION FOR PUBLIC CORRUPTION 21-2. LAW ENFORCEMENT TECH TO COMBAT TERRORISM TRANSLATI. ANTI-CORRUPTION FOR JUDGES AND PROSECUTORS OCT 21-. WILDLIFE TRAFFICKING INVESTIGATORS PRGRM 18-29 JUN. WILDLIFE BORDER INSPECTIONS 6-10 AUG TRANSLATION. LEADERSHIP FOR AFRICAN EXECUTIVES 9-13 SEP 2019. SMALL ARMS TRAFFICKING 10-14 DEC 2018 TRANSLATION. PUBLIC CORRUPTION 3-7 DEC 2018 TRANSLATION. OVERSEAS PROTECTIVE OPERATIONS 22-26 OCT 18 TRANSL. FY 2020 PCO WORKSHOP OPERATION COSTS

description.narrative: This award strives to help foreign partners professionalize their military forces through educational programs and technical support, ensuring that their force can develop and maintain the requisite capacity to effectively carry out its military mission through reliance on discipline, accountability, effective professional standards, and technical expertise. More specifically, this includes PROSECUTING ENVIRONMENTAL CRIMES 18-22 NOV 2019: TRANSLATION [Covers contractual services of educators and translators when they furnish their own supplies and equipment.]. Covers payments of reimbursable value added taxes on purchases as required, e.g., in European Common Market countries.. Covers contractual services of educators and translators when they furnish their own supplies and equipment.. ANTI-CORRUPTION AND PUBLIC CORRUPTION 23-27 SEP 19: TRANSLATION [Covers contractual services of educators and translators when they furnish their own supplies and equipment.]. FY 2019 ILEA VAT OBLIGATION [Covers payments of reimbursable value added taxes on purchases as required, e.g., in European Common Market countries. .]. FY 2018 ILEA VAT OBLIGATION[Covers payments of reimbursable value added taxes on purchases as required, e.g., in European Common Market countries.]. WILDLIFE TRAFFICKING INVESTIGATORS PROGRAM 13-24 AUG 2018 TRANSLATION[Covers contractual services of educators and translators when they furnish their own supplies and equipment.]. FY 2020 ILEA-BOTSWANA GOVERNMENT CAPITAL CONTRIBUTION [Covers miscellaneous contractual services not otherwise classified.]. OVERSEAS PROTECTIVE OPERATIONS 9-13 JULY 2018 TRANSLATION[Covers contractual services of educators and translators when they furnish their own supplies and equipment.]. FY 2019 ILEA STAFF FOB RSA TOKENS OBLIGATION [Covers the costs for local and long distance calls based on a rate-per-call basis or on the number of minutes of use under the FTS system.]. PR8272193: Transportation Surcharge [Covers the costs for receiving, inspecting, stocking, pulling from stock, delivery, and other related services such as the 1 percent acquisition surcharge for executing grants and contracts above post warrant levels.]. PUBLIC CORRUPTION: APR 16-20 2018 TRANSLATION[Covers contractual services of educators and translators when they furnish their own supplies and equipment.]. FY 2018 SUPPLIES OBLIGATION [Covers the costs of office supplies, stationary, forms, paper, other supplies, and minor equipment items.]. Covers the costs for local and long distance calls based on a rate-per-call basis or on the number of minutes of use under the FTS system.. WILDLIFE BORDER INSPECTION TRAINING 16-20 SEP 2019: TRANSLATION [Covers contractual services of educators and translators when they furnish their own supplies and equipment.]. Covers the costs of Despatch Agency services purchased through the Working Capital Fund.. CYBER INVESTIGATIONS 20-24 AUG 2018 TRANSLATION[Covers contractual services of educators and translators when they furnish their own supplies and equipment.]. Covers the costs of office supplies, stationary, forms, paper, other supplies, and minor equipment items.. FINANCIAL INVESTIGATIVE TECHNIQUES 5-9 NOV TRAVEL & OPERATIONS[Covers contractual services of educators and translators when they furnish their own supplies and equipment.]. FY 2018 ILEA VAT OBLIGATION [Covers payments of reimbursable value added taxes on purchases as required, e.g., in European Common Market countries. .]. WILDLIFE TRAFFICKING INVESTIGATORS PROGRAM 13-24 AUG 2018 TRANSLATION [Covers contractual services of educators and translators when they furnish their own supplies and equipment.]. Award Description - BASIC INVESTIGATION OF COMPUTER & ELECTRONIC CRIME 6-10 AUG 2018 TRANSLATION. INTL LAW ENFORCEMENT ACADEMY[Covers the costs of office supplies, stationary, forms, paper, other supplies, and minor equipment items.]. Award Description - FINANCIAL INVESTIGATION FOR PUBLIC CORRUPTION 21-25 MAY 2018 TRANSLATION. PR8684055: ILEA: Stand up desk Surcharge obligation [Covers the costs of Despatch Agency services purchased through the Working Capital Fund.]. LAW ENFORCEMENT TECH TO COMBAT TERRORISM TRANSLATION 27-31 AUG 18[Covers contractual services of educators and translators when they furnish their own supplies and equipment.]. FY 2019 ILEA VAT OBLIGATION[Covers payments of reimbursable value added taxes on purchases as required, e.g., in European Common Market countries.]. ANTI-CORRUPTION FOR JUDGES AND PROSECUTORS OCT 21-25 2019: TRANSLATION [Covers contractual services of educators and translators when they furnish their own supplies and equipment.]. WILDLIFE TRAFFICKING INVESTIGATORS PRGRM 18-29 JUN 2018 TRANSLATION[Covers contractual services of educators and translators when they furnish their own supplies and equipment.]. WILDLIFE BORDER INSPECTIONS TRAINING 6-10 AUG 2018 TRANSLATION[Covers contractual services of educators and translators when they furnish their own supplies and equipment.]. LEADERSHIP FOR AFRICAN EXECUTIVES 9-13 SEP 2019: TRANSLATION [Covers contractual services of educators and translators when they furnish their own supplies and equipment.]. Covers the costs for receiving, inspecting, stocking, pulling from stock, delivery, and other related services such as the 1 percent acquisition surcharge for executing grants and contracts above post warrant levels.. SMALL ARMS TRAFFICKING 10-14 DEC 2018 TRANSLATION[Covers contractual services of educators and translators when they furnish their own supplies and equipment.]. PUBLIC CORRUPTION 3-7 DEC 2018 TRANSLATION[Covers contractual services of educators and translators when they furnish their own supplies and equipment.]. OVERSEAS PROTECTIVE OPERATIONS 22-26 OCT 18 TRANSLATION[Covers contractual services of educators and translators when they furnish their own supplies and equipment.]. FY 2020 PCO WORKSHOP OPERATION COSTS [Covers services supplied by other U.S. Government agencies not otherwise classified.].

Through educational programs and technical support, help foreign partners professionalize their military forces, ensuring that their force can develop and maintain the requisite capacity to effectively carry out its military mission through reliance on discipline, accountability, effective professional standards, and technical expertise. In addition, activities assist foreign partners so that their military forces reliably demonstrate consistent support for adherence to norms of human rights; support the concept of civilian executive authority/control of the military; and have the capacity for institutional and security sector reform.

participating-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

participating-org.usg:office-name: Bureau of International Narcotics and Law Enforcement Affairs

owner-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

description.narrative: Botswana is one of the United States' strongest allies in Africa and offers a powerful model to the region and world of a stable, democratic African nation. However, while attempting to meet the pressing need to diversify its diamond-dependent economy, Botswana continues to struggle to address one of the world's highest rates of income inequality and the second highest HIV prevalence rate in the world. U.S. assistance supports management of the HIV/AIDS epidemic, including the epidemic's broader impact on women and vulnerable citizens. U.S. assistance also seeks to build a more robust military-to-military partnership with Botswana while encouraging its support for regional security.

sector.narrative: Civilian peace-building, conflict prevention and resolution
Stabilization Operations and Security Sector Reform
